column4: Is it a bad idea to mix package updating through apt-get, aptitude and/or synaptic package manager, or will they each know which packages the other(s) have installed?
they all use the same database, so you can use them all without worry
Thanks. Saw some forum posts from 2005 that said that mixing was a bad idea. I infer from this that once it WAS a bad thing to do?
to my knowledge there has never been any issue with using them all on the same machine, but you can only use one at a time since they all access the same database
